answers.answer: Hi,the only way to speed up the healing is to have very very good blood sugar control, combined with antibiotics or other wound care approach.She will need to work with her Dr. on this, as care of this type of non-healing wound requires specialist care.Very good diet and vitamin c supplements may also help.

question: My aunt is 45 years old. she had an operation done 2 months ago. it was healing really well when suddenly it opened agin. doctors said the blood sugar she had was too high and it cause the surgery to get an infection. She has diabetes and is taking insulin right now. my question corresponds as if there is a faster way to heal the wound and stop the infection.?
title: Faster way for healing a surgery re opening caused by diabetes.
